public class MarioPyramid extends CommonGoalCard

  • Constructor Details

    • MarioPyramid

      public MarioPyramid(int nPlayers, String description, CommonCardType name) throws PlayersNumberOutOfRange, RemoteException
      The card constructor creates the card and assign the ScoringToken's stack based on the number of players
      Parameters:
      nPlayers - represents the numbers of players that are playing the game, necessary for the tokens to be assigned at the card
      description - it is used for explain the card's constraint
      name - the name of the card to distinguish the different types
      Throws:
      PlayersNumberOutOfRange - when nPlayers exceed the numbers of the tile, tooManyPlayersException will be thrown
      RemoteException - RMI Exception

      verifyConstraint it is used to check if the player bookshelf given constraint
      Specified by:
      verifyConstraint in class CommonGoalCard
      Parameters:
      bookshelf - the player bookshelf to verify
      Returns:
